languages.text: "Да. Теперь это — ваша планета по праву. Но все не так просто — варп-маршрут к ней оказался утерян. Я расскажу об этом в свое время. Я могу продолжать?"

traits.locale_text: "Да. Теперь это — ваша планета по праву. Но все не так просто — варп-маршрут к ней оказался утерян. Я расскажу об этом в свое время. Я могу продолжать?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

languages.text: “是的，如今这颗行星是你的领土，但事情没这么简单。通往那里的亚空间航道已经遗失了，这件事情我之后会解释的，我现在可以继续讲了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: “是的，如今这颗行星是你的领土，但事情没这么简单。通往那里的亚空间航道已经遗失了，这件事情我之后会解释的，我现在可以继续讲了吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Sí. Ahora el planeta le corresponde por derecho. Pero no es tan sencillo; la ruta de disformidad que lleva a él se perdió. Lo explicaré llegado el momento. ¿Puedo seguir?».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Ahora el planeta le corresponde por derecho. Pero no es tan sencillo; la ruta de disformidad que lleva a él se perdió. Lo explicaré llegado el momento. ¿Puedo seguir?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだ。だが、そう単純な話ではありません。そこに至るワープ航路が失われたのです。いずれ説明しましょう。続けても構いませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。だが、そう単純な話ではありません。そこに至るワープ航路が失われたのです。いずれ説明しましょう。続けても構いませんか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Der Planet gehört jetzt von Rechts wegen Euch. Aber so einfach ist es nicht – die Warp-Route dorthin war verloren. Ich werde es gleich erklären. Darf ich fortfahren?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Der Planet gehört jetzt von Rechts wegen Euch. Aber so einfach ist es nicht – die Warp-Route dorthin war verloren. Ich werde es gleich erklären. Darf ich fortfahren?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, et elle vous revient de droit, à présent. Malheureusement, la route Warp qui y mène a été perdue. Je vous expliquerai en temps voulu. Puis-je poursuivre mon récit ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, et elle vous revient de droit, à présent. Malheureusement, la route Warp qui y mène a été perdue. Je vous expliquerai en temps voulu. Puis-je poursuivre mon récit ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Bu gezegen, artık meşru hakkındır. Ancak durum bundan çok daha karmaşık. Salis Prime'a çıkan öteboyut rotası kayboldu. Zamanı gelince açıklayacağım. Devam edeyim mi?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. Now the planet is yours by right. But it's not as simple as that — the warp route leading to it was lost. I will explain in due time. May I continue?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Bu gezegen, artık senin meşru hakkın. Ancak durum bundan çok daha karmaşık. Salis Prime'a çıkan öteboyut rotası kayboldu. Zamanı gelince açıklayacağım. Devam edeyim mi?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
